David Rolfe Graeber (; February 12, 1961 – September 2, 2020) was an American anthropologist, anarchist activist and author. He was known for his books ' (2011), "The Utopia of Rules" (2015) and ' (2018).
He was a professor of anthropology at the London School of Economics.
Graeber was born in New York City. He studied at the University of Chicago and at State University of New York at Purchase.
Graeber died on 2 September 2020 in a Venice hospital from a hemorrhage at the age of 59.
